means: 美食（烹饪）法的，烹任学的

entry.def: Gastronomic is used to describe things that are concerned with good food.

example.ex: Paris is the gastronomic capital of the world...
She is sampling gastronomic delights along the Riviera.
example.tran: 她在里维埃拉一路品尝着美食。
